companyName: Nuveen Short Duration Credit Opportunities Fund of Beneficial Interest
description:
Under normal circumstances, the Fund will invest at least 80% of “Assets,” at time of purchase, in loans or securities in the issuing company’s capital structure that are senior to its common equity, including but not limited to debt securities, preferred securities.

Please note that this new policy is separate from and in addition to the fund’s existing policy that it will invest at least 70% of its Managed Assets in adjustable rate corporate debt instruments, including senior secured loans, second lien loans and other adjustable rate corporate debt instruments.
